name: SpaceMiner (Sunny Valley Studio)
description:
"You need to catch those meteors!" -says your Captain. 
Gather as much meteors as you can, gathering point to pass each progressively difficult level. 
Fear not though. After every round you can buy some upgrades to help you in the upcoming round. 
You have 3 lives so be fast & Good Luck! 

This is my first game - all feedback appreciated!
